sources.title: White Woman (1933)
sources.description: A nightclub singer marries the rich owner of a rubber plantation. When she returns with him to his estate in Malaysia, she finds out that he is cruel, vicious and insanely jealous. She and the plantation's overseer develop a mutual attraction, but are terrified at what will happen if her husband finds out. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/white-woman-1933/

metadata.Plot: A nightclub singer marries the rich owner of a rubber plantation. When she returns with him to his estate in Malaysia, she finds out that he is cruel, vicious and insanely jealous. She and the plantation's overseer develop a mutual attraction, but are terrified at what will happen if her husband finds out.
metadata.Writer: Samuel Hoffenstein, Gladys Lehman, Norman Reilly Raine
metadata.Actors: Carole Lombard, Charles Laughton, Charles Bickford
